Name: Acidic Swamp Ooze
Description: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon. Oozes love Flamenco. Don't ask.

Name: Ancestral Healing
Description: Restore a minion to full Health and give it Taunt. I personally prefer some non-ancestral right-the-heck-now healing, but maybe that is just me.

Name: Animal Companion
Description: Summon a random Beast Companion. You could summon Misha, Leokk, or Huffer! Huffer is more trouble than he's worth.

Name: Arcane Explosion
Description: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. This spell is much better than Arcane Implosion.

Name: Arcane Intellect
Description: Draw 2 cards. Playing this card makes you SMARTER. And let's face it: we could all stand to be a little smarter.

Name: Arcane Missiles
Description: Deal 3 damage randomly split among all enemies. You'd think you'd be able to control your missiles a little better since you're a powerful mage and all.

Name: Arcane Shot
Description: Deal 2 damage. Magi conjured arcane arrows to sell to hunters, until hunters learned just enough magic to do it themselves. The resulting loss of jobs sent Stormwind into a minor recession.

Name: Arcanite Reaper
Description: No… actually you should fear the Reaper.

Name: Archmage
Description: Spell Damage +1 You earn the title of Archmage when you can destroy anyone who calls you on it.

Name: Assassin's Blade
Description: Guaranteed to have been owned by a real assassin. Certificate of authenticity included.

Name: Assassinate
Description: Destroy an enemy minion. If you don't want to be assassinated, move to the Barrens and change your name. Good luck!

Name: Backstab
Description: Deal 2 damage to an undamaged minion. It's funny how often yelling "Look over there!" gets your opponent to turn around.

Name: Blessing of Kings
Description: Give a minion +4/+4. (+4 Attack/+4 Health) Given the number of kings who have been assassinated, are you sure you want their blessing?

Name: Blessing of Might
Description: Give a minion +3 Attack. "As in, you MIGHT want to get out of my way." - Toad Mackle, recently buffed.

Name: Bloodfen Raptor
Description: Kill 30 raptors. - Hemet Nesingwary

Name: Bloodlust
Description: Give your minions +3 Attack this turn. blaarghghLLGHRHARAAHAHHH!!

Name: Bluegill Warrior
Description: Charge He just wants a hug. A sloppy... slimy... hug.

Name: Booty Bay Bodyguard
Description: Taunt You can hire him... until someone offers him enough gold to turn on you.

Name: Boulderfist Ogre
Description: ME HAVE GOOD STATS FOR THE COST

Name: Charge
Description: Give a friendly minion Charge. It can't attack heroes this turn. "Guys! Guys! Slow down!" - some kind of non-warrior minion

Name: Chillwind Yeti
Description: He always dreamed of coming down from the mountains and opening a noodle shop, but he never got the nerve.

Name: Claw
Description: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn and 2 Armor. The claw decides who will stay and who will go.

Name: Cleave
Description: Deal 2 damage to two random enemy minions. Hey you two…could you stand next to each other for a second…

Name: Consecration
Description: Deal 2 damage to all enemies. Consecrated ground glows with Holy energy. But it smells a little, too.

Name: Core Hound
Description: You don’t tame a Core Hound. You just train it to eat someone else before it eats you.

Name: Corruption
Description: Choose an enemy minion. At the start of your turn, destroy it. It starts with stealing a pen from work, and before you know it, BOOM! Corrupted!

Name: Dalaran Mage
Description: Spell Damage +1 You don't see a lot of Dalaran warriors.

Name: Darkscale Healer
Description: Battlecry: Restore 2 Health to all friendly characters. Healing is just something she does in her free time. It's more of a hobby really.

Name: Deadly Poison
Description: Give your weapon +2 Attack. Rogues guard the secrets to poison-making carefully, lest magi start incorporating poison into their spells. Poisonbolt? Rain of Poison? Poison Elemental? Nobody wants that.

Name: Divine Spirit
Description: Double a minion's Health. Double the trouble. Double the fun!

Name: Dragonling Mechanic
Description: Battlecry: Summon a 2/1 Mechanical Dragonling. She is still working on installing the rocket launcher add-on for Mr. Bitey.

Name: Drain Life
Description: Deal 2 damage. Restore 2 Health to your hero. "I've just sucked one year of your life away."

Name: Dread Infernal
Description: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to ALL other characters. "INFERNOOOOOOOOOO!" - Jaraxxus, Eredar Lord of the Burning Legion

Name: Elven Archer
Description: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage. Don't bother asking her out on a date. She'll shoot you down.

Name: Execute
Description: Destroy a damaged enemy minion. It's okay, he deserved it.

Name: Fan of Knives
Description: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. Draw a card. I wouldn't say I LOVE knives, but I'm definitely a fan.

Name: Fiery War Axe
Description: During times of tranquility and harmony, this weapon was called by its less popular name, Chilly Peace Axe.

Name: Fire Elemental
Description: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage. He can never take a bath. Ewww.

Name: Fireball
Description: Deal 6 damage. This spell is useful for burning things. If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.

Name: Flamestrike
Description: Deal 4 damage to all enemy minions. When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

Name: Flametongue Totem
Description: Adjacent minions have +2 Attack. Totemsmiths like to use the rarest woods for their totems. There are even rumors of totems made of Ironbark Protectors.

Name: Frost Nova
Description: Freeze all enemy minions. Hey man, that's cold. Literally and metaphorically.

Name: Frost Shock
Description: Deal 1 damage to an enemy character and Freeze it. FROST SHOCK!

Name: Frostbolt
Description: Deal 3 damage to a character and Freeze it. It is customary to yell "Chill out!" or "Freeze!" or "Ice ice, baby!" when you play this card.

Name: Frostwolf Grunt
Description: Taunt Grunting is what his father did and his father before that. It's more than just a job.

Name: Frostwolf Warlord
Description: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other friendly minion on the battlefield. The Frostwolves are locked in combat with the Stormpike Expedition over control of Alterac Valley. Every attempt at peace-talks has ended with Captain Galvangar killing the mediator.

Name: Gnomish Inventor
Description: Battlecry: Draw a card. She's never quite sure what she's making, she just knows it's AWESOME!

Name: Goldshire Footman
Description: Taunt If 1/2 minions are all that is defending Goldshire, you would think it would have been overrun years ago.

Name: Grimscale Oracle
Description: Your other Murlocs have +1 Attack. These are the brainy murlocs. It turns out that doesn’t mean much.

Name: Guardian of Kings
Description: Battlecry: Restore 6 Health to your hero. Holy beings from the beyond are so cliché!

Name: Gurubashi Berserker
Description: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +3 Attack. No Pain, No Gain.

Name: Hammer of Wrath
Description: Deal 3 damage. Draw a card. A good paladin has many tools. Hammer of Wrath, Pliers of Vengeance, Hacksaw of Justice, etc.

Name: Hand of Protection
Description: Give a minion Divine Shield. This spell has been renamed so many times, even paladins don’t know what it should be called anymore.

Name: Healing Touch
Description: Restore 8 Health. 8 Health, no waiting.

Name: Hellfire
Description: Deal 3 damage to ALL characters. It's spells like these that make it hard for Warlocks to get decent help.

Name: Heroic Strike
Description: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn. Really, if you're a hero, this is every strike.

Name: Hex
Description: Transform a minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt. If you Hex a Murloc... it really isn't much of a change, is it?

Name: Holy Light
Description: Restore 6 Health. If you are often bathed in Holy Light, you should consider wearing sunscreen.

Name: Holy Nova
Description: Deal 2 damage to all enemies. Restore 2 Health to all friendly characters. If the Holy Light forsakes you, good luck casting this spell. Also, you're probably a jerk.

Name: Holy Smite
Description: Deal 2 damage. It doesn't matter how pious you are. Everyone needs a good smiting now and again.

Name: Houndmaster
Description: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +2/+2 and Taunt. "Who let the dogs out?" he asks. It's rhetorical.

Name: Humility
Description: Change a minion's Attack to 1. This card makes something really damp. Oh wait. That's "Humidity."

Name: Hunter's Mark
Description: Change a minion's Health to 1. Never play 'Hide and Go Seek' with a Hunter.

Name: Innervate
Description: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only. Some druids still have flashbacks from strangers yelling "Innervate me!!" at them.

Name: Ironbark Protector
Description: Taunt I dare you to attack Darnassus.

Name: Ironforge Rifleman
Description: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage. "Ready! Aim! Drink!"

Name: Ironfur Grizzly
Description: Taunt "Bear Carcass 1/10"

Name: Kill Command
Description: Deal 3 damage. If you have a Beast, deal 5 damage instead. "Kill!", he commanded.

Name: Kobold Geomancer
Description: Spell Damage +1 In the old days, Kobolds were the finest candle merchants in the land. Then they got pushed too far...

Name: Kor'kron Elite
Description: Charge The Kor'kron are the elite forces of Garrosh Hellscream. Let's just say you don't want to run into these guys while wearing a blue tabard.

Name: Light's Justice
Description: Prince Malchezaar was a collector of rare weapons. He'd animate them and have them dance for him.

Name: Lord of the Arena
Description: Taunt He used to be a 2100+ rated arena player, but that was years ago and nobody can get him to shut up about it.

Name: Magma Rager
Description: He likes to think he is powerful, but pretty much anyone can solo Molten Core now.

Name: Mark of the Wild
Description: Give a minion Taunt and +2/+2. (+2 Attack/+2 Health) Not to be confused with Jim of the Wild.

Name: Mind Blast
Description: Deal 5 damage to the enemy hero. This spell blasts you directly in the MIND.

Name: Mind Control
Description: Take control of an enemy minion. Nominated as "Spell Most Likely to Make Your Opponent Punch the Wall."

Name: Mind Vision
Description: Put a copy of a random card in your opponent's hand into your hand. I see what you did there.

Name: Mirror Image
Description: Summon two 0/2 minions with Taunt. Oh hey it's Mirror Image! !egamI rorriM s'ti yeh hO

Name: Moonfire
Description: Deal 1 damage. "Cast Moonfire, and never stop." - How to Be a Druid, Chapter 5, Section 3

Name: Mortal Coil
Description: Deal 1 damage to a minion. If that kills it, draw a card. If your spells look like horrifying skulls, let's be honest, you should get to draw some cards.

Name: Multi-Shot
Description: Deal 3 damage to two random enemy minions. You see, it's all about throughput.

Name: Murloc Raider
Description: Mrrraggglhlhghghlgh, mrgaaag blarrghlgaahahl mrgggg glhalhah a bghhll graggmgmg Garrosh mglhlhlh mrghlhlhl!!

Name: Murloc Tidehunter
Description: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Murloc Scout. "Death will rise, from the tides!"

Name: Nightblade
Description: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero. Your face is the place you'd probably least like a dagger, and where rogues are most likely to deliver them.

Name: Northshire Cleric
Description: Whenever a minion is healed, draw a card. They help the downtrodden and distressed. Also they sell cookies.

Name: Novice Engineer
Description: Battlecry: Draw a card. "Half of this class will not graduate… since they'll have been turned to chickens." - Tinkmaster Overspark, teaching Gizmos 101.

Name: Oasis Snapjaw
Description: His dreams of flying and breathing fire like his idol will never be realized.

Name: Ogre Magi
Description: Spell Damage +1 Training Ogres in the art of spellcasting is a questionable decision.

Name: Polymorph
Description: Transform a minion into a 1/1 Sheep. There was going to be a pun in this flavor text, but it just came out baa-d.

Name: Power Word: Shield
Description: Give a minion +2 Health.

Name: Raid Leader
Description: Your other minions have +1 Attack. "That's a 50 DKP minus!"

Name: Razorfen Hunter
Description: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Boar. Someone did mess with Tuskerr once. ONCE.

Name: Reckless Rocketeer
Description: Charge One Insane Rocketeer. One Rocket full of Explosives. Infinite Fun.

Name: River Crocolisk
Description: Edward "Lefty" Smith tried to make luggage out of a river crocolisk once.

Name: Rockbiter Weapon
Description: Give a friendly character +3 Attack this turn. This would be real handy if your enemy is made of rock.

Name: Sacrificial Pact
Description: Destroy a Demon. Restore 5 Health to your hero. This is the reason that Demons never really become friends with Warlocks.

Name: Sap
Description: Return an enemy minion to your opponent's hand. Rogues love sappy movies.

Name: Savage Roar
Description: Give your characters +2 Attack this turn. What do they roar? Nobody can quite tell, but it sounds like "Elephant Macho Breeze". It's probably not that, though.

Name: Sen'jin Shieldmasta
Description: Taunt Sen'jin Villiage is nice, if you like trolls and dust.

Name: Shadow Bolt
Description: Deal 4 damage to a minion. It’s a Bolt. Its made out of Shadow. What more do you need to know!

Name: Shadow Word: Death
Description: Destroy a minion with an Attack of 5 or more. If you miss, it leaves a lightning-bolt-shaped scar on your target.

Name: Shadow Word: Pain
Description: Destroy a minion with 3 or less Attack. A step up from a spell cast by many beginning acolytes: "Shadow Word: Annoy".

Name: Shattered Sun Cleric
Description: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +1/+1. They always have a spare flask of Sunwell Energy Drink™!

Name: Shield Block
Description: Gain 5 Armor. Draw a card. Shields were invented because Face Block is USELESS.

Name: Shiv
Description: Deal 1 damage. Draw a card. Rogues are experts at SHIV-al-ry.

Name: Silverback Patriarch
Description: Taunt He likes to act like he's in charge, but the silverback matriarch actually runs things.

Name: Sinister Strike
Description: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero. There's something about this strike that just feels off. Sinister, even.

Name: Soulfire
Description: Deal 4 damage. Discard a random card. Are you lighting a soul on fire? Or burning someone with your OWN soul? This seems like an important distinction.

Name: Sprint
Description: Draw 4 cards. Rogues are not good joggers.

Name: Starfire
Description: Deal 5 damage. Draw a card. Balance is important to druids. This card is perfectly balanced.

Name: Starving Buzzard
Description: Whenever you summon a Beast, draw a card. If you feed him, he loses his whole identity.

Name: Stonetusk Boar
Description: Charge This card is boaring.

Name: Stormpike Commando
Description: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage. The Stormpike Commandos are demolition experts. They also bake a mean cupcake.

Name: Stormwind Champion
Description: Your other minions have +1/+1. When Deathwing assaulted the capital, this soldier was the only member of his squad to survive. Now he's all bitter and stuff.

Name: Stormwind Knight
Description: Charge They're still embarrassed about "The Deathwing Incident".

Name: Succubus
Description: Battlecry: Discard a random card. Warlocks have it pretty good.

Name: Swipe
Description: Deal 4 damage to an enemy and 1 damage to all other enemies. When a bear rears back and extends his arms, he's about to Swipe! ... or hug.

Name: Timber Wolf
Description: Your other Beasts have +1 Attack. Other beasts totally dig hanging out with timber wolves.

Name: Totemic Might
Description: Give your Totems +2 Health. Totem-stomping is no longer recommended.

Name: Tracking
Description: Look at the top three cards of your deck. Draw one and discard the others. For the person who just cannot decide what card to put in their deck!

Name: Truesilver Champion
Description: Whenever your hero attacks, restore 2 Health to it. It Slices, it Dices. You can cut a tin can with it. (But you wouldn't want to.)

Name: Tundra Rhino
Description: Your Beasts have Charge. Tundra rhinos are often mistaken for kodos. Or am I mistaken?

Name: Vanish
Description: Return all minions to their owner's hand.

Name: Voidwalker
Description: Taunt No relation to "The Voidsteppers", the popular Void-based dance troupe.

Name: Voodoo Doctor
Description: Battlecry: Restore 2 Health. Voodoo is an oft-misunderstood art. But it is art.

Name: War Golem
Description: Golems are not afraid, but for some reason they still run when you cast Fear on them. Instinct, maybe? A desire to blend in?

Name: Warsong Commander
Description: Your Charge minions have +1 Attack. The Warsong clan is such drama. It's really not worth it to become a commander.

Name: Water Elemental
Description: Freeze any character damaged by this minion. Don't summon a water elemental at a party. It'll dampen the mood.

Name: Whirlwind
Description: Deal 1 damage to ALL minions. The way to tell seasoned warriors from novice ones: the novices yell "wheeeee" while whirlwinding.

Name: Wild Growth
Description: Gain an empty Mana Crystal. Grow your own mana crystals with this Mana Crystal Growth Kit, only 39.99!

Name: Windfury
Description: Give a minion Windfury. Windfury is like Earthfury and Firefury, but more light and airy.

Name: Windspeaker
Description: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Windfury. Is there anything worse than a Windspeaker with halitosis?

Name: Wolfrider
Description: Charge Orcish raiders ride wolves because they are well adapted to harsh environments, and because they are soft and cuddly.
